scripts.build: tsc src/Sandbox.ts -m es2015 -d true -t es2019 --outDir dist && terser dist/Sandbox.js --compress 'keep_fnames=/SandboxFunction/' --mangle 'keep_fnames=/SandboxFunction/' --output dist/Sandbox.min.mjs --source-map
scripts.build:node: tsc src/Sandbox.ts -m commonjs -d true -t es2019 --outDir dist/node
